channel.title: Joe James on Strat
channel.description: Recent content in Joe James on Strat

item.title: The Autistic Experience - Silenced Voices Finally Heard
item.description:
“You’re not alone. I hear you. I see you. You’re a valid person. Autism is an intrinsic part of you and that’s not something to ever be ashamed of.

Lola, 27, England

Thanks Lola, it means a lot.
